channel.title: NMS:GEMI on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:GEMI on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Nasdaq to Invest $50 Million in Gemini Crypto Exchange
item.description: The Winklevoss twins’ Gemini Space Station Inc. has secured a $50 million investment from Nasdaq Inc. in a private placement as the crypto exchange prepares for an initial public offering.
